name: Freeloaders
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

A group of slackers living for free in a rock star's mansion suddenly find their lives threatened when the musician decides to sell his pad. They must scramble to stop him or wind up homeless. From the producers of Beerfest and Super Troopers Freeloaders is a hysterically funny comedy with an all-star cast, hilarious cameos and music by Adam Duritz.

They must scramble to stop him or wind up homeless. From the producers of Beerfest and Super Troopers Freeloaders is another hysterically funny comedy with an all-star cast and hilarious cameos.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
